Uses of BasisMapping in edu.ucla.sspace.basis
 

Classes in edu.ucla.sspace.basis that implement BasisMapping
 class AbstractBasisMapping<T,K>
          An abstract base class for BasisMappings that implements most of the required functionality.
 class StringBasisMapping
          A string based BasisMapping.
 

Uses of BasisMapping in edu.ucla.sspace.common
 

Constructors in edu.ucla.sspace.common with parameters of type BasisMapping

Uses of BasisMapping in edu.ucla.sspace.dv
 

Subinterfaces of BasisMapping in edu.ucla.sspace.dv
 interface DependencyPathBasisMapping
          An interface for specifying how the occurrence of a word in a specific syntactic relationship is quantified as a dimension in the vector basis.
 

Classes in edu.ucla.sspace.dv that implement BasisMapping
 class PathBasedBasisMapping
          A BasisMapping implementation where each unique path consisting of words and relations corresponds to a unique dimension.
 class RelationBasedBasisMapping
          A BasisMapping implementation where each word and relation combination corresponds to a unique dimension.
 class RelationPathBasisMapping
           
 class WordBasedBasisMapping
          A BasisMapping implementation where each word corresponds to a unique dimension regardless of how it is grammatically related.
 

Uses of BasisMapping in edu.ucla.sspace.esa

          Constructs a new ExplicitSemanticAnalysis using the provided objects for processing.
 

Uses of BasisMapping in edu.ucla.sspace.gws
 

Classes in edu.ucla.sspace.gws that implement BasisMapping
 class WordBasisMapping
          A BasisMapping implementation where each word corresponds to a unique dimension regardless of its word position.
 class WordOrderBasisMapping
          A BasisMapping implementation where each word and position corresponds to a unique dimension.
 

Constructors in edu.ucla.sspace.gws with parameters of type BasisMapping
GenericWordSpace(int windowSize, BasisMapping<Duple<String,Integer>,String> basis)
          Creates a new GenericWordSpace with the provided window size that uses the specified basis mapping to map each co-occurrence at a specified position to a dimension.
